thread.title: Rita Ora's boyfriend says 'no' to flying
thread.title_full: Rita Ora's boyfriend says 'no' to flying - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rita Ora's boyfriend says 'no' to flying
text:
Singer Rita Ora has flown 39,000 miles in the last month, but her new boyfriend Travis Barker hates planes.
READ: 'Hot' Rita Ora flaunts 'ample cleavage' in lingerie pics
Ora, 24, has been travelling all over the world as she balances her music career with her role as a judge on the British version of The X Factor , yet her 39-year-old boyfriend has refused to fly ever since he survived a jet crash in 2008 that killed four people, femalefirst.co.uk.
For latest Music updates follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
"Right now, flying is a no. Planes kill people," Barker said.
Despite this, Ora earlier attended a friend's wedding in Kosovo, New York fashion week and later this month, she will be in Britain for the next stage of The X Factor .

Listen to Rita Ora on Gaana.com
"When the live shows start, she will have to limit her travel to give her category her full attention," The Sun newspaper Quote: d a source as saying.
